content: "What were you doing yesterday evening at 8 o'clock?" "I was having dinner with my family, but while we were eating, my brother surfed the Internet."
translations: ita:Che facevi ieri sera alle 8﹕00﹖ Cenavo con la mia famiglia, ma mentre noi mangiavamo mio fratello navigava su Internet
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by unknown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
